fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Authorize one to six players each day.
- Choose a role at night. You appear as that role to all investigative effects.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the night, your authorized targets will be revealed. They remain authorized until you choose new players to authorize.
- Members of the good faction may only visit authorized targets.
- Each time you use your ability, you must authorize at least one member of the Mafia.
- You must use your ability every day, and you can't authorize someone three days in a row.
- This role can't spawn with the Sentries.
